scripts.dev: nodemon -e js -x node --watch src -r dotenv/config src/index.js
scripts.prod:agent1: BOTIUM_AGENT_NAME="Default Agent" node -r dotenv/config src/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.prod:agent2: BOTIUM_AGENT_NAME="Default Agent 2" node -r dotenv/config src/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.prod:agent3: BOTIUM_AGENT_NAME="Default Agent 3" node -r dotenv/config src/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.link: npm link botium-connector-dialogflow botium-connector-webdriverio botium-connector-directline3 botium-core
scripts.build:dist: npm run eslint && rollup -c && javascript-obfuscator dist/botium-box-agent.js --output dist/botium-box-agent.js --compact true --self-defending true
scripts.publish:free-dist: npm run build:dist && mkdir -p ~/botium-box-basic-dist/agent  && cp -Rf dist package.json package-lock.json ~/botium-box-basic-dist/agent && cp .env.botium-box-basic-dist ~/botium-box-basic-dist/agent/.env
